thag2.43:1.2_0: like horses tamed by a charioteer,
thag2.43:1.3_0: who has abandoned conceit and defilements;
thag2.43:1.4_0: who is such as envied by even the gods?
thag2.43:2.2_0: like horses tamed by a charioteer,
thag2.43:2.3_0: who has abandoned conceit and defilements;
thag2.43:2.4_0: I am such as envied by even the gods.
